GSD.description:
scsi: mpt3sas: Fix use-after-free warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit ea10a652ad2ae2cf3eced6f632a5c98f26727057. For more details please see the references link.
